summary: LTR FM LAURA FEINSTEIN (WA) RE THE DEFECTIVE HEAD GASKET...*MR  THE HEAD GASKET HAD TORN.  OIL LEAKED FROM THE VEHICLE.  THE DEALER WAS CONTACTED FOR MONETARY ASSISTANCE WHICH WAS DISCUSSED WITH A FEW CHRYSLER REPRESENTATIVES AND THE REQUEST WAS DENIED.  THE CONSUMERS MECHANIC STATED THAT THERE WERE OTHER VEHICLES THAT HAD EXPERIENCED THE SAME PROBLEM.  THE CONSUMER HAD REQUESTED A FULL REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE REPAIR COST.  SCC *TS    *JB
